gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta
Class BasicBusinessObjectDescriptor<T>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta.BasicBusinessObjectDescriptor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of bean being described by this BusinessObjectDescriptor.
All Implemented Interfaces:
BusinessObjectDescriptor<T>
public class BasicBusinessObjectDescriptor<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BusinessObjectDescriptor<T>

Set of properties that describes a bean. This descriptor can't support properties of type collection.
